Here is a minimal example for `mirage`. First load a test toy data-set,

```{r}
library(mirage)
data(mirage_toy)
head(mirage_toy)
n1 = 1500
n2 = 1500
```
Then anaylze with `mirage`

```{r}
res = mirage(mirage_toy,n1,n2)
str(res)
```
